message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. I'm asking for $9,500.  I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,500 is cutting it too close to my minimum. How about we meet in the middle at $9,000? I'm confident you'll see a significant return on this investment.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but I am still not able to go above $8,750 for this product. I believe we can find a mutual ground here.
Bob, I'm sensing we're getting close.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $8,875.  This is my final offer, as I need to consider other options if we can't agree.
